title: 2016 Worlds
body:
This is just another one of those inquirerys regarding CS Riven. In the past riot has said that most limited skins make a return after 4 years and this seasons worlds would have been 4 seasons from when CS Riven was released. Will it be re-released this season worlds or not? 

I would like a straight answer and sorry if this seems pushy

- Srtty

replies.body:
Hey! 

We haven't announced any details pertaining to if we're going to re-release Championship Riven this year, but you are correct that [we have said](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/H004gAPw-ecommerce-qa?comment=00350002) it's possible we'll release her again. As the event gets closer, we'll be releasing more details about the event in general, so hang tight!
Alright thanks for this, as a dedicated riven main over several accounts since the end of season three I don't just want this skin i need it ;w;
I... I think you mean filthy Riven main. <3 I kid, I kid! Totally understandable. If she does come back, we'll definitely have an announcement, so keep an eye out!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=6u7IVxOB,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-03-01T23:21:38.863+0000)
>
> I... I think you mean filthy Riven main. <3 I kid, I kid! Totally understandable. If she does come back, we'll definitely have an announcement, so keep an eye out!

Was there ever any announcement as to how many people actually got the Riven skin? It would be interesting to know if anyone actually guessed the crazy world's bracket correctly. Or if Cloud 9 just destroyed everyone's predictions. :P lol

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=6u7IVxOB,comment-id=00000000000000000002,timestamp=2016-03-02T17:19:22.159+0000)
>
> Last year? It was 1.

Lol holy crap! Just one? Well... Cool to know. Thanks! :)

> [{quoted}](name=GhastlyGhoulMan,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=6u7IVxOB,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2016-03-02T02:07:15.845+0000)
>
> Was there ever any announcement as to how many people actually got the Riven skin? It would be interesting to know if anyone actually guessed the crazy world's bracket correctly. Or if Cloud 9 just destroyed everyone's predictions. :P lol

1 person.
If i remind correctly it was a silver (4?) swain main on EUW! Forget the name though.
